mapper.select: SELECT r.res_id as res_id,res_name,res_tell,res_addr,res_runtime,res_keyword,res_latitude,res_longitude,res_rating,like_count,ifnull(review_count,0) AS review_count FROM restaurant r LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT res_id,count(*) AS review_count FROM review_test rt GROUP BY res_id) rt ON r.res_id =rt.res_id

SELECT r.res_id as res_id,res_name,res_tell,res_addr,res_runtime,res_keyword,res_latitude,res_longitude,res_rating,like_count,ifnull(review_count,0) AS review_count FROM restaurant r LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT res_id,count(*) AS review_count FROM review_test rt GROUP BY res_id) rt ON r.res_id =rt.res_id

ORDER BY r.like_count DESC
